titleStmt.title: The comparation of a vyrgin and a martyr
Virginis et martyris comparatio. English
titleStmt.author: Erasmus, Desiderius, d. 1536.
Paynell, Thomas.

publicationStmt.publisher: In aedibus Thomae Bertheleti regii impressoris],

notesStmt.note: A translation, by Thomas Paynell, of: Erasmus, Desiderius. Virginis et martyris comparatio.

Running title reads: The comparison of a virgin and martyr.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
